TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit MessageQuery extends System.Object

summary.span: 定義類別的核心行為，這些類別會用來搜尋訊息中特定的相互關聯資料。

span.span: Defines the core behavior of classes used to search for specific correlating data in a message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別類似於 類別。The class is similar to the class. 不過， 方法會傳回針對訊息評估查詢的結果，而不會傳回相符項目。However, instead of returning matches, the method returns the results of evaluating a query against a message. 查詢的結果是訊息中的一個值。The result of the query is a value in the message. 使用這個值做為索引鍵，可將訊息與其他訊息產生相互關聯。Use the value as a key to correlate the message to other messages. 若要加入資料的新屬性，請使用 類別的 方法。To add a new property for the data, use the method of the class. > [!NOTE] > 如需 的具體實作，請參閱 類別。For a concrete implementation of the , see the class. ## 使用 XPathMessageQuery 和 MessageQueryCollection 類別Using the XPathMessageQuery and MessageQueryCollection classes 您可以建立一組查詢物件，並且將物件插入至 類別的執行個體，藉此最佳化查詢程序。You can optimize the query process by creating a set of query objects and inserting them into an instance of the class. > [!NOTE] > 如需 的具體實作，請參閱 類別。For a concrete implementation of the , see the class. 常見的用法是，在集合中填入擁有相同 XPath 述詞，而只有最後分葉值不同的查詢。A common usage is to populate the collection with queries that have the same XPath predicate, but that differ only in the final leaf value. 例如，下列 XPath 查詢除了 final 子句之外完全相同。For example, the following XPath queries are identical except for the final clause. 數量屬性設為 1 之所有項目的第一個查詢，以及產品屬性設為 'Contoso' 之項目的第二個查詢：The first queries for all elements that have the quantity attribute set to 1, and the second queries for elements with the product attribute set to 'Contoso'): ``` "/s12:Envelope/s12:Body/PurchaseOrder/Items/Item[@quantity = 1]" "/s12:Envelope/s12:Body/PurchaseOrder/Items/Item[@product = 'Contoso']" ``` 類別可讓您建立查詢資料表，這些查詢只有些許差異，可讓處理程序更有效率。The class allows you to create tables of queries that differ only slightly, enabling more efficient processing. 或者，您可以使用 類別儲存和評估訊息查詢。Alternatively, you can use the class to store and evaluate message queries. ## Examples 下列範例會建立訊息和 XPath 訊息查詢。The following example creates a message and XPath message queries. 查詢會由包含在 物件內的 物件評估。The queries are evaluated by the objects contained in an object. 每一個查詢的結果都會使用 類別的 屬性測試。The results of each query are tested using the property of the class. [!code-csharp[XPathMessageQuery#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/xpathmessagequery/cs/source.cs#0)] [!code-vb[XPathMessageQuery#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/xpathmessagequery/vb/source.vb#0)]

summary.span: 建立查詢集合，傳回與其相關聯的特定資料型別。

span.span: Creates a collection of queries that returns a specific type of data associated with it.

returns.span: ：與資料型別相關聯的查詢集合。

span.span: The collection of queries associated with the data type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法主要供 類別使用。This method is intended to be used by the class.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，針對訊息執行查詢並且傳回符合查詢的值。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, runs a query against the message and returns a value that satisfies the query.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這兩個多載之間的差異在於，其中一個會採用 參數，但是不允許檢查本文；另一個則採用 參數，而且可以檢查訊息的任何部分。The difference between the two overloads is that one takes a parameter and is not permitted to examine the body; the other takes a parameter and can examine any part of the message. 訊息標頭會自動進行緩衝，並且可以進行查詢，而不會被取用。Message headers are automatically buffered and can be queried without being consumed. 不過，如果會查詢本文，則必須緩衝處理整個訊息，因為查詢可能取用未緩衝處理的訊息本文。However, if the body is to be queried, then the entire message must be buffered because an unbuffered message body can be consumed by the query.

span.span: The type of the value to return.

returns.span: 符合查詢的可列舉結果集合。

span.span: An enumerable collection of results that satisfy the query.
